## Que tablas hay?

```{r}
DBI::dbListTables(con)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
tbl(con,"subte_caba")
```

```{r}
my_table <- tbl(con,"subte_caba")

my_table %>% 
  group_by(FECHA) %>% 
  summarize(
    pasajeros = sum(pax_TOTAL)
  )
```

```{r}
my_summmary <- 
  my_table %>% 
  group_by(FECHA) %>% 
  summarize(
    pasajeros = sum(pax_TOTAL)
  ) %>% 
  collect()
```

## Visualizar

```{r}
my_summmary %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = FECHA, y = pasajeros))+
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
library(ggthemes)
theme_set(theme_economist())
my_summmary %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = FECHA, y = pasajeros))+
  geom_line()

```

```{r}
theme_set(theme_fivethirtyeight())
my_summmary %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = FECHA, y = pasajeros))+
  geom_line()+
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma)
  
```
